fix songs title is not same from spotify

title: Release Zuikaku@3.0.0
content: Using prototype for extend function and not using collection for queue
Refactor handler Shoukaku for better code efficiency
Not extend data and rollback queue to collection

title: Release Zuikaku@3.1.4
content: Counted 3 days from July 29,2021, all of these BOT services are turned off due to problems in obtaining data. All service can be used now
Using clientOptions.makeCache for change deprecated options
Fix command nuke only for textChannel
Using dayjs instead of moment & petitio for all http request

title: Release Zuikaku@3.2.7
content: Support play track from apple music & spotify episode and show
Using select menu for flags search
